name: thermometer
description:
Thermometer is a vim plugin for mercurial users. Right now is in alpha state. Available commands are:

- Hgst to open a quickfix window with changes to the repository
- Hgdiff to diff the current buffer with its last version on the repository
- g:HgStatusForFile() to be used in status lines to get the status of the buffer
- Hgstreload to reset status data used in g:HgStatusForFile()

Follow it's development in https://github.com/dgsuarez/thermometer
